channel.title: Comments on: Energy Blogs – The lighter greener side of things

item.title: By: kpointer
item.dc:creator: kpointer
item.description: Thank you so much for featuring GlobalGiving's giveaway featuring Organic Bouquet roses! Organic Bouquet gifts are a cool and unique way to send your love - especially when you send one of our Flowers for Good http://www.organicbouquet.com/c_21/charitable_gifts.html where a portion of the proceeds go towards your favorite charity.
item.content:encoded: Thank you so much for featuring GlobalGiving’s giveaway featuring Organic Bouquet roses! Organic Bouquet gifts are a cool and unique way to send your love – especially when you send one of our Flowers for Good http://www.organicbouquet.com/c_21/charitable_gifts.html where a portion of the proceeds go towards your favorite charity.
